fields_of_interest: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives: Environment/Waste, Water, Energy, Transport, Public procurement, Services of general interest, EEA, social affairs
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
membership:
CEEP - the European Centre of Employers and Enterprises providing public services 
www.ceep.eu
goals__remit: Being the employers' and political organisation for publicly owned enterprises in Norway.
relevant_communication: Meetings, conferences, seminars and workshops mainly together with umbrella organisations like CEEP - Center of European Employers providing public services, The Council of European Municipalities and Regions (CEMR).
